mapper.insert: insert into che (che_num , xin_xi, is_zl, price,picture_url) values (#{cheNum}, #{xinXi}, #{isZl}, #{price},#{pictureUrl})
mapper.select: select che_num,xin_xi,is_zl,price,picture_url from che where xin_xi=#{xinXi}
select che_num ,xin_xi,is_zl,price,picture_url from che where che_num=#{cheNum}
